post_natal_services.title: Post-Natal Massage
post_natal_services.view_details: A relaxing massage to relieve muscle tension and improve circulation
post_natal_services.description: A soothing post-natal massage to help reduce stress, ease muscle pain, and promote overall relaxation.

post_natal_services.title: Tummy Tightening Treatment
post_natal_services.view_details: Targeted treatment to tighten the tummy area post-delivery
post_natal_services.description: A specialized treatment to tone and tighten the abdominal area, restoring muscle elasticity after childbirth.

post_natal_services.title: Breastfeeding Support & Consultation
post_natal_services.view_details: Guidance and assistance for new mothers
post_natal_services.description: Personalized breastfeeding support and consultation to help mothers with lactation issues and positioning.

post_natal_services.title: Post-Natal Yoga
post_natal_services.view_details: Gentle yoga classes designed for post-natal recovery
post_natal_services.description: Yoga tailored for new mothers to help regain flexibility, strengthen the body, and relieve stress.

post_natal_services.title: Post-Natal Skin Rejuvenation Facial
post_natal_services.view_details: A facial to restore skin radiance after childbirth
post_natal_services.description: A gentle facial designed to combat post-pregnancy skin changes, helping to restore a youthful glow.

post_natal_services.title: Pelvic Floor Strengthening
post_natal_services.view_details: Pelvic floor rehabilitation for new mothers
post_natal_services.description: A specialized treatment to strengthen the pelvic floor muscles, promoting overall health and recovery after childbirth.

post_natal_services.title: Post-Natal Body Scrub
post_natal_services.view_details: Exfoliating scrub for rejuvenating skin post-pregnancy
post_natal_services.description: A nourishing body scrub that exfoliates and softens the skin, leaving it refreshed and revitalized.
